name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 17, Hengyang, Hunan. An old lady was carrying a bucket of swill and walking on the road with a boy in dirty clothes.
The photographer said that the grandmother seemed to be blind, and a body was tied around the boy's neck to help him lead the way.
The photographer got off the car and talked to the grandmother, but she was unconscious. A fellow villager revealed that the child's father had died and his mother had remarried. The old lady did not let the child go to school because she was afraid that the child would be abducted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 17, the third session of the 14th Jiangxi Provincial People's Congress opened in Nanchang, but the media broadcasting the event closed the comment section. 
Previously, the Li Yixue incident in Nanchang, Jiangxi, had sparked widespread heated discussions at home and abroad.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: January 18, Baoji, Shaanxi. Construction workers sleep on the floor in the lobby of Xinxiguan Hospital to demand their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
January 18, Tianjin. A merchant disclosed Meituan's double-edged bill. The customer's order amount was 25 yuan. After deducting the commission, delivery fee, and coupons, the merchant actually received more than 6 yuan.
In addition, the customer's end showed that the distance to the merchant was 4.4 kilometers, but the merchant's end showed that the customer was 6.9 kilometers away from the merchant. Meituan charged the merchant a delivery fee based on the distance of 6.9 kilometers, and if the order was not placed, the merchant would be punished by the platform.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: January 18, Zhejiang. A migrant worker who was owed wages stood on a tower crane and shouted at the top of his lungs.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: January 15th, Dalian, Liaoning: Investors of Shanhaihui Group gathered outside the Dalian Intermediate People's Court for several consecutive days to protest their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 13, villagers from Xiaohu Village, Zhengzhou, Henan Province, gathered to demand transition fees.
Recently, there have been many cases of demanding transition fees for demolition and resettlement in various parts of Henan Province, and some people's transition fees have even been in arrears for several years.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: January 3, Nantong, Jiangsu Longxiyuan, two months after the property management company forced them to pay for the keys to their properties, which led to a conflict with the owners, Longxiyuan workers blocked the door to demand their wages

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 14, migrant workers in Hainan gathered to demand their wages. The police said: "I understand your feelings, but your behavior of demanding wages is suspected of disturbing the so-called public order. I support you in demanding wages, but you must not take such extreme measures. I understand you, but the public security organs have a bottom line. We cannot say that we can indulge you (demanding wages) even though we know that you are breaking the law." The video was later released by the media as a propaganda of the police's patient persuasion.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
TikTok and CapCut (Cut overseas version) are both banned in the United States.
TikTok's pop-up window shows: Sorry, TikTok is currently unavailable. The United States has enacted a law banning TikTok. Unfortunately, this means you can't use TikTok now. Fortunately, President Trump has said that he will work with us to find a solution to reopen TikTok after he takes office. Stay tuned.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 19, Chifeng, Inner Mongolia. An old man said that he almost lost his eyesight and was a first-level disabled person. In 2017, the government cancelled his subsidy on the grounds of poverty alleviation, making it difficult for him to make a living. After that, he applied for the five-guarantee household, but he has not enjoyed any benefits so far. He reported it to his superiors, and the disability subsidy was also cancelled. The old man said: Where did my targeted poverty alleviation funds go? I beg the leaders to solve it and give me a way out.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 17, the owner of Nantong Xiaoniu Kung Fu martial arts hall ran away, and some parents called the police to protect their rights.
The video shows that the wall of the martial arts hall is hung with "Children's education cannot wait", and the title of its Douyin promotional video also reads "A strong youth means a strong country."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Some Chinese netizens' feelings after checking accounts with the US "TikTok refugees":
"After checking accounts with the US, I found myself turning from pink to deep red"
"Don't let them know how happy we are, or they will go crazy"
"I have seen what capitalism looks like. When I see the Americans crying, I just want to laugh"
"I love my mother even more now. My mother spoils her citizens without saying a word"
